general_advisory: Conserve rain water for utilising in land preparation by making bund and clogging the pores inside the field. Make necessary arrangements for field preparation as monsoon has already entered the state. Regular monitoring for incidence of insect pests should be done and application of pesticide should be done by observing weather forecast. Farmers are advised to undertake soil test to know the soil fertility status of their crop field prior to land preparation for Kharif crops. Prepare raised bed nursery for Kharif vegetables like Brinjal, Chilli etc. for timely planting.
